name: Chidiya Udd!
description:
If you grew up in India chances are you have played the game Chidiya Udd in your childhood. Though nothing can beat the experience of playing with friends in front of you, I have tried to recreate the game on Figma. I hope it helps you relive some childhood memories.


This is the first release. I am working on improving the visual experience in the next release. Don't forget to take screenshots or videos while playing and tag us!


You can read more about the game here.
